title: The Road to Phandalin
summary: After a long rest at the Driftwood Tavern, the party finally departed for Phandalin. Night brought wolves to their camp, but Kaelia's fire wolf and Semaj's intimidating stare convinced the pack to back down. The session ended with goblins ambushing the party near two dead horses.

best_moments.title: Ekran's Pan Flute Mastery
best_moments.description: Ekran found a pan flute and rolled a nat 20 on his first performance check, instantly becoming proficient.

quotes.speaker: GM
quotes.text: Wow. As you take out this pan flute that you found in this dusty warehouse, you began to play it with ease. You start practicing some scales and you pick it up quite fast.

quotes.speaker: Belden
quotes.text: Well then, let's have a party.

quotes.speaker: Ekran
quotes.text: How long have you been playing that? I guess just a few minutes.

best_moments.title: The Wand of Smiles
best_moments.description: Semaj tested his new wand on the party. It didn't work on anyone.

quotes.speaker: Semaj
quotes.text: Does anyone else want to look at this thing for me? I think it's broken.

quotes.speaker: GM
quotes.text: Semaj, when you get this wand back you realize that it has all of its charges back on it. You can feel that the wand is still usable but for some reason it hasn't been working.

best_moments.title: Kaelia's Fire Wolf
best_moments.description: Using Control Flames, Kaelia shaped the campfire into a prowling wolf guardian.

quotes.speaker: Kaelia
quotes.text: I can make simple images so I'd like to actually make this fire into a wolf. And I'd like the wolf to be like prowling around our campsite.

quotes.speaker: Semaj
quotes.text: That's so cool, do you have a fire wolf?

quotes.speaker: Kaelia
quotes.text: I'm gonna be squishy but I can do cool looking things.

quotes.speaker: Belden
quotes.text: Badass. Now I know what rage against the machine we should have hadâ€”Sleep Now with the Fire Wolf.

best_moments.title: Semaj Stares Down the Alpha
best_moments.description: When wolves approached the camp, Semaj held the alpha's gaze with commanding authority.

quotes.speaker: GM
quotes.text: The alpha wolf his gaze is going to shift to you Semaj. Do you hold the gaze of this wolf?

quotes.speaker: GM
quotes.text: Semaj you hold this alpha wolf's gaze with a steady unwavering look... your expression is calm almost like regal at this point.

best_moments.title: Wolves Back Down
best_moments.description: The combination of the fire wolf and Semaj's presence convinced the wolf pack to retreat.

quotes.speaker: GM
quotes.text: The alpha wolf is giving this low kind of rumbling bark that doesn't feel like a threat and the wolves are now starting to kind of give you a wide berth as they disappear into the cave.

quotes.speaker: Semaj
quotes.text: I'm gonna start breathing a sigh of relief that I didn't realize I had been holding my breath the entire time.

quotes.speaker: Kaelia
quotes.text: Well, it's not always about killing stuff.

best_moments.title: Star Trek Soundtrack
best_moments.description: Richard noticed the background music sounded very familiar.

quotes.speaker: Semaj
quotes.text: I'm not gonna lie, this soundtrack sounds like straight up Star Trek. Space, the final frontier.

Found two dead horses - signs of an ambush
